content: quote: Russian news agencies report that more than 35,000 army officers are to be fired in 2009 as part of sweeping military reforms. [Washingtonpost.com, April 28, 2009] Ouch......200,000 by 2012 is the total planed reduction. "None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free." -Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quote: Russian news agencies report that more than 35,000 army officers are to be fired in 2009 as part of sweeping military reforms. [Washingtonpost.com, April 28, 2009]

content: Just cutting off the dead weight. Russia will also get rid of 133 of 249 generals as well. Officers will also be tested and those that cant pass are history. A million man army is quite sufficient for National security especially when Russia isnt planning to have troops deployed all over the world.
